paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the BRCA2 variant NM_000059.3:c.771_775del, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Of those, 195 (55%) contacted the GC unit.
Of those, 195 (55%) contacted the GC unit.

functional_data.summary: The variant is associated with increased risk for hereditary breast and ovarian cancer.

variants.segregation_data: Yes, it segregates with disease in families.
variants.additional_notes: The majority of counsellees initially expressed worries but later communicated gratitude for the knowledge gained.
key_quotes: 74 (38%) had prior knowledge of the pathogenic variant (PV) in the family.
The majority initially stated worries, anxiety or other negative emotion but later in the process many communicated gratitude for the knowledge gained.

extraction_metadata.notes: Extracted data is based on the information provided in the main text.
